title: Shroud Debates Progress
post:
A paper by Jack Markwardt referring to the early Christians’ “Discipline of the Secret” notes that they gave strict obedience to Christ’s commandment:  “Give not that which is holy unto the dogs, neither cast ye your pearls before swine, lest they trample them under their feet, and turn again and rend you”.[Matthew 7:6 (the Sermon on the Mount). ] 
Some assurance of good faith is required before undertaking any such debate I feel!
author: daveb of wellington nz
